name: Meat Warriors
description:
Meat Warriors

Fight as a hotdog in this local two player fighting game. Each player has three lives and can lose the by jumping off the edge or losing your health. 

Game Jam Entry for RNDGAME Jam 2020 hosted by ThatTomHall

This is my first game jam submission made with Godot. I know there are a few things that could be improved (combat, art, more meat characters) but hope you enjoy playing!

Controls

P1: 'W', 'A', 'S', 'D'; 

'C' - to attack

P2: 'Up', 'Left', 'Right', 'Down';

' . ' - to attack
